QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Ashenvale!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Sentinel Shyela at Orendil's Retreat in northwestern Ashenvale.$B$BThe Horde's aggression in Ashenvale cannot be allowed to stand! Your help is needed to repel the invaders and restore the sacred forest. Head south through the Twilight Vale in Darkshore to reach the forest of Ashenvale.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Sentinel Shyela at Ordanil's Retreat in northwestern Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: Have you come to help us fight back against the forces of the Horde? Every blade and spell will be needed!
